2074.subject: LING
2074.course_title_long: Nature of Language & Language Acquisition: Service Learning
2074.descrlong: Nature of Language & Language Acquisition: Service Learning is an optional field-based service learning course which accompanies LS 392. Students spend a minimum of 24 hours per semester focusing on application of linguistics in reading and writing development in school settings. Requires completion of an approved community service project. (Offered fall semester.)
